content: विभिन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Broken asunder, divided, split. {@--2@} Pierced, wounded. {@--3@} Dispelled, driven away, dispersed. {@--4@} Perplexed, bewildered. {@--5@} Moved to and fro. {@--6@} Disappointed. {@--7@} Different, various. {@--8@} Mixed, blended, variegated; विभिन्नवर्णा गरुडाग्रजेन सूर्यस्य रथ्याः परितः स्फुरंत्या <ls>Śi. 4. 14.</ls> {@--9@} Manifested, displayed. {@--10@} Become faithless. --न्नः <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva.
